attributes.action: Introduce political awareness education into the national curriculum.
attributes.additional_details:
Voter turnout for the general elections has declined overall since 
1945. http://www.ukpolitical.info/Turnout45.htm

The 18-24 age group has the lowest turnout to vote of all age groups.   

http://www.ukpolitical.info/Turnout15.htm

We cannot let this decline continue if we want a fair, democratic system that listens to the voices of people from all social backgrounds.
attributes.background: I believe it is essential that young people are educated on the subject of politics and political and social issues. They should be encouraged to form their opinions in preparation for their ability to vote, so that ultimately we have more people actively involved and a fairer voting system.
